name: Robot's Journey
description:
**I highly recommend to play the game in full screen**

This Game was made for the NOKIA 3310 Jam 3

________________________________________

This is a puzzle game were you play as a robot. Your objective is to arrive to the exit tile.

When the robot is off you can input him orders that he will do when you turn him on.

_______________________________________

WASD = movement inputs

Z = turn the robot on

X = Delete your last input

R = Restart the level

______________________________________

Empty tile = a normal tile, you can walk on it

Box = you can push it to activate buttons or to fill the void tiles, you can't push 2 boxes at the same time

Button = when all buttons are pressed by boxes, the exit is activated

Void Tile = you can't walk on it, but if you push a box on the tile, it transform to a normal tile

Exit = when it's activated and you enter it, you go to the next level
______________________________________

The theme of the Jam was On/Off, so I made a puzzle game were you give orders to the robot, and when you turn him on, it follows them

_____________________________________

The last level (the one with 49 moves) is completely optional, if you don't want to do it press "v" to skip the level

____________________________________

This is my first time on a Jam, and I had a great time.

I hope you have a great time with my game : )

If you see any error please tell me in the commentaries.
